content:
re: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/80810#issuecomment-783794694

If I were to make arch-specific changes to this max_by_val_size, what's the best way to do that?
should I add this to the target spec? or just hard-code arch information somewhere else?
further context: the s390x regression came from #79547, but I'd like to leave that optimization in place for arches that work with it
